GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: responds with an article object when given a valid article_id. The object should have properties of: author, title, article_id, body, topic, created_at, votes and article_img_url

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: responds with an array of all comments for the given article sorted by date with the most recent comments first

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of user objects with keys of 'username', 'name' and 'avatar_url'

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: responds with the comment associated with the given article_id

comment.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comment.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the votes property in the given article by the value given in the request body
